thread.title: Kohl’s Cardholders: Pressure Cooker or Air Fryer $69.99 Shipped (Reg. $129.99) + Earn $10 Kohl’s Cash
thread.title_full: Kohl’s Cardholders: Pressure Cooker or Air Fryer $69.99 Shipped (Reg. $129.99) + Earn $10 Kohl’s Cash

author: Mary (Stellar Sidekick)
title: Kohl’s Cardholders: Pressure Cooker or Air Fryer $69.99 Shipped (Reg. $129.99) + Earn $10 Kohl’s Cash
text:
Now through January 22nd, Kohl’s cardholders can save 30% off your entire purchase with the promo code COCOA30 AND score FREE shipping on every order with the code FREE4JAN at checkout! If you’re in the market for a pressure cooker or air fryer, check out these sweet deals you can score…
Kohl’s Cardholder Deals: Buy 1 Power Pressure Cooker XL $99.99 (reg. $129.99) 
Use the codes COCOA30 (30% off for cardholders) and FREE4JAN (free shipping)
Final cost $69.99 shipped!
* Plus, you’ll earn $10 in Kohl’s Cash! 
Buy 1 NuWave 3-qt. Digital Air Fryer $99.99 (reg. $119.99) 
Use the codes COCOA30 (30% off for cardholders) and FREE4JAN (free shipping)
Final cost $69.99 shipped!
* Plus, you’ll earn $10 in Kohl’s Cash! 
Not a Kohl’s cardholder? Save an extra 15% off your entire purchase or 20% off when you spend over $100 with code SAVEMORE at checkout (expires today, 1/16). Shipping is free on any order of $75 or starts at $8.95 for orders less than $75 OR opt for free in-store pick up if available near you.

AND, through today, January 16th, you’ll also get $10 in Kohl’s Cash for every $50 you spend. You can then use your earned Kohl’s Cash coupon from January 17th – January 28th.
